response.answer_text: I define perception as the ability to sense both what is seen and what is unseen. The extent to which each person accesses their world through the lens of their 5 senses differs (and it’s my understanding that scientists now believe we have as many as 21 different senses). What also differs is each person’s ability to access that which is unseen, in terms of subtle energies and messages that come to your awareness in a variety of ways. I believe we are just now beginning to tap into what will be our potential as Perceptive Souls…
A2A - What allows perception? 1. The way you are. You are built with 5 senses to perceive.2. The consistent and persistent nature of reality. There is something to perceive.
